word: But quickly the scene changed. The mob started up. The Roman soldiers, the priests and Judas, gathered about Christ. They seemed ashamed of their weakness, and fearful that He would yet escape. Again the question was asked by the Redeemer, \93Whom seek ye?\94 . . . [and] again they answered, \93Jesus of Nazareth.\94 The Saviour then said, \93I have told you that I am He: if therefore ye seek Me, let these go their way\94pointing to the disciples. He knew how weak was their faith, and He sought to shield them from temptation and trial. For them He was ready to sacrifice Himself.
